mobios.dist
类 MSMSMetric

java.lang.Object
  mobios.dist.MSMSMetric
所有已实现的接口：
java.io.Serializable, Metric
public class MSMSMetric
extends java.lang.Object
implements Metric

MSMSMetric is an implementation of a fuzzy cosine distance metric for comparing tandem spectra signatures. Elements of the vectors are equal, within a given tolerance.

版本：
2004.11.29
作者：
Smriti Ramakrishnan, Willard
另请参见：
序列化表格

构造方法摘要
MSMSMetric()
          default constructor provides default values for min, max, step, tolerance min = 0; max = 0; step = 0; tol = MSMSConstants.MS_TOLERANCE

方法详细信息

getDistance

public double getDistance(IndexObject v1,
                          IndexObject v2)
从接口 Metric 复制的描述
Computes the distance between two objects.

指定者：
接口 Metric 中的 getDistance
参数：
v1 - the IndexObject over which the keys are defined.
v2 - the other IndexObject over which the keys are defined.
返回：
the distance between the two objects
